alert.note: Alert for Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 03 at 4:49PM CST until February 03 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wilcox County in south central Alabama... * Until 515 PM CST. * At 449 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Belknap to 4 miles north of Pine Apple to 8 miles northeast of Beatrice, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pine Apple. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for south central Alabama.
